messages.content: My order #12345 contains a 'NovaTech Pro' blender. The motor seems to be exhibiting excessive vibration during operation. Is this considered a defect, and would I be eligible for a return and refund under your warranty policy?

Thank you for contacting us regarding order #12345 and the NovaTech Pro blender. Excessive vibration during operation, particularly if accompanied by unusual noises, could indicate a manufacturing defect. Please refer to section 3.2 of our warranty policy (available at [link to warranty policy]) which outlines defects impacting functionality. Based on your description, your blender likely qualifies for a return and full refund. To initiate the return process, please visit [link to return portal] and enter your order number.
